info.name: Colornames.org
info.description: The most rudimentary, no-authentication-needed sort of API for the "crowdsourced" data contributed to [colornames.org](https://colornames.org/download/).

request.description:
Returns a JSON dictionary of the last 100 submissions to colornames.org.

*Ex*:  

`[{"nameId":1944061,"hexCode":"4c72f2","name":"Roneria"},{"nameId":1944060,"hexCode":"7ce0ef","name":"Puffy"}, ... ]`

JSON lookup of hex to color name.

*Ex*:

`{"hexCode":"00006b","name":"David Blue"}`

JSON request for a random color name.

*Ex*:

`{"hexCode":"91ae93","name":"Ashen Leaves"}`
